net.nemerosa.ontrack.boot.ui

Class StructureController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nemerosa.ontrack.ui.controller.AbstractResourceController
      • net.nemerosa.ontrack.boot.ui.AbstractProjectEntityController
        • net.nemerosa.ontrack.boot.ui.StructureController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/structure")
public class StructureController
extends AbstractProjectEntityController
    Gives access to the structure. See ProjectEntityType for the list of entities that are mapped.
